ygData.subject: Re: Charisma effect on magic resists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Mine is 95.  I suspect the difference is in our sensitivity to this type of thing.  Some people don t mind a bit of arcadishness in their RPGs, others do.
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 9 Aug 1999, Roop Dirump wrote:
>
> Very strange indeed. I may miss a note here and there, but not much. I
> have absolutely no problem getting my songs started. Can't remember offhand
> the exact number, but my dexterity is around 110 or so. I have a feeling
> dexterity plays a bigger role in getting a song up and running, rather than
> charisma. If everyone else has good dexterity and experiences this problem
> I am mystified.

Mine is 95. I suspect the difference is in our sensitivity to
this type of thing. Some people don't mind a bit of
arcadishness in their RPGs, others do.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
